title: Ketza Pacific Construction
author: ''
date: '2022-09-08'
slug: ketza_pacific_construction
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Ketza Pacific Construction. The average
  contract duration was 0.78 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.1M. The longest
  contract was 2 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $2.8M.
lookup_name: 'KETZA PACIFIC CONSTRUCTION'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '9'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '78%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '26%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.57'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '323.9K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.78'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.1M'
s425_max_duration: '2'
s422_max_contract_value: '2.8M'
---
